item.description:
You are invited to Chinatown's favorite back-to-school event!

Bring the kids and have some fun! Free and open to the public, including:

-Watermelon Eating Contests
-Arts and Crafts Activities
-Inflatable Obstacle Course
-Magician & Balloon Twister
-Community Resource Tables
-Pony Rides
-Outdoor Jungle Gym
-Health and Dental screenings

Thank you to our generous sponsors!

Platinum Sponsors: State Street Corporation, Tufts Medical Center
Silver Sponsors: South Cove Community Health Center, TJX Companies
Bronze Sponsors: Boston Medical Center HealthNet Plan, Cathay Bank, Rockland Trust, Tufts University
item.how_to_find_us: Sorry, I will not be there. you guys just go have fun. or you can connect other member whoever willing to go. have fun.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: BCNC's 26th Annual Oak Street Fair
